text: Kananjalo siya kususa nayiphi na inzondwano nengqondo yokulimazanaezintliziywenizabo,imilamboiyakumpompoza phantsi kwabo, baya kuthi: “Iindumiso nemibulelo mayibe kuAllâh Osikhokeleyo saba lapha, besingekhe sisifumane isiKhokelo, ukuba uAllâh Ebengakhanga Asikhokelele Yena! Inene abaThunywa beNkosi yethu beza nenyaniso”. Kuya kumenyezwa kubo kuthiwe: Le yiPaladesi enaniyifuna ukuba ibe lilifa ngenxa (yemisebenzi elungileyo) enayenzayo.”
